overview: Ever just long for the "Good ol' Days"? Well, that's just what Chasey thinks we need. Jim Enright serves up this saucy little tale about life in the happy days of the 50's, through the eyes of the sex goddess of the 90's. Sound like fun? You bet your bobbi socks! Just think, how could life have ever been the same with a girl like Chasey way back when? So, whatta you waiting for? Pless play and find out.
tagline: An Erotic seach for The Good Ol' Days
title: Chasin' The Fifties
